result.execSummary:
The defendant John F Edge was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Retail Theft - Intentionally Take (<=$500), a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.50(1m)(b).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

parties.name: Milwaukee County Clerk of Circuit Court

supervisions.notes:
Forfeiture of $100.00 inclusive of Court costs and fees, by February 9, 2017 or to be docketed as a civil judgment

Defendant to take prescribed medications.
Restitution set at zero.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. John F Edge

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Sentencing proceeded.  Statements by the State, defense and defendant.  

AS TO COUNT 1:

Court ordered defendant to pay $100.00 FINE inclusive of court costs and fees by February 9, 2017, or to be docketed as a civil judgment.

Court ordered defendant take prescribed medications.
.
Court ordered restitution set at $0 (zero).
20 day appeal,

Filed;
-Notice of Right to Seek Postconviction Relief.

Defendant John F Edge in court with attorney Daniel Gordon Mitchell.  Student Intern Carl Knepel under the student practice rule supervised by Assistant District Attorney Brittany Skye Kachingwe appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: TC. 

AS TO COUNT 1:

Defendant changes plea to GUILTY. Defendant examined as to his plea, advised of his Constitutional rights and the maximum penalty. Court found that defendant freely, voluntarily and intelligently waived his rights. Plea questionnaire received and filed. Parties stipulate to the complaint as a factual basis to sustain defendant's plea. Court found defendant guilty as charged in the criminal complaint and ordered a Judgment of Conviction be entered on the record. Defendant further advised that if he is not a US citizen deportation is possible.

Defendant John F Edge in court with attorney Daniel Gordon Mitchell.  Jennifer L Pickett appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: TC. Case calendared for projected guilty plea and sentencing. For reasons stated on the record,   Court ordered case adjourned for projected guilty plea and sentencing in Branch 31.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for February 9, 2016 at 08:30 am.

Defendant John F Edge in court with attorney Daniel Gordon Mitchell.  Jennifer L Pickett appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: TC. Case calendared for final pre-trial. For reasons stated on the record, Court ordered case adjourned for projected guilty plea and sentencing in Branch 31.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for January 27, 2016 at 08:30 am.

Defendant John F Edge in court with attorney Daniel Gordon Mitchell.  Kelly O'Neill appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Case in court for final pre-trial. For reasons stated on the record, Court ordered case adjourned for final pre-trial in Branch 31. The court vacates the jury trial scheduled for 1/13/2016.  Final pre-trial scheduled for January 13, 2016 at 08:30 am.

Defendant John F Edge in court with attorney Daniel Gordon Mitchell.  Kelly O'Neill appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: TC. Case calendared for jury trial. New defense counsel just appointed to the case.  Defense counsel is awaiting discovery. Defense counsel requests jury trial.  Any and all motions are to be filed with the court by the final pretrial date.  Case is adjourned for Final Pretrial Conference and Jury Trial, Branch 37.  Final pre-trial scheduled for December 2, 2015 at 08:30 am.  Jury trial scheduled for January 13, 2016 at 09:00 am.

Defendant John F Edge in court with attorney Torrie R. Williams.  Brittany Skye Kachingwe appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: dds.

Matter calendared for Final Pretrial.  Parties informed that Branch 37 is in jury trial and unable to hear this matter on the record.  Parties still in contest posture.  Case REMAINS set for Jury Trial on 9-23-15 at 9:00 a.m. before Branch 37.  Agreed Upon Request for a New Court Date is signed and filed.

Defendant John F Edge in court with attorney Torrie R. Williams.  Alex T. Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Deputy Court Clerk: TC. Case calendared for projected guilty plea and sentencing. Defense counsel requests jury trial date.  Any and all motions are to be filed with the court by the final pretrial date. Case is adjourned for Final Pretrial Conference and Jury Trial, Branch 37.  Final pre-trial scheduled for August 26, 2015 at 08:30 am.  Jury trial scheduled for September 23, 2015 at 09:00 am.

Defendant John F Edge in court with attorney Torrie R. Williams.  Alex T. Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: TC.  Final pre-trial conference held. Court ordered jury trial date on June 24, 2015 at 9:00 a.m. converted to projected guilty plea and sentencing.
-From Attorney T.R. Williams on behalf of her client; received and filed.   Deputy Court Clerk: TC.
-Defendant's Proposed Jury Instructions from Attorney T.R. Williams on behalf of her client; received and filed.   Deputy Court Clerk: TC.
-From Assistant District Attorney Alex Mueller; received and filed.   Deputy Court Clerk: TC.
-From Assistant District Attorney Alex Mueller; received and filed.   Deputy Court Clerk: TC.

Defendant John F Edge in court with attorney Torrie R. Williams.  Alex T. Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Deputy Court Clerk: tmk.   
Defense counsel has received discovery and offer.  Any and all motions are to be filed with the court by the final pretrial date.  Case is adjourned for Final Pretrial Conference and Jury Trial, Branch 37.  Final pre-trial scheduled for May 27, 2015 at 08:30 am.  Jury trial scheduled for June 24, 2015 at 09:00 am.

Defendant John F Edge in court.  Karine O'Byrne appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Defendant advised that this case is assigned to Judge Dee, Branch 37.
Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.   Defendant received a copy of the complaint and was advised of right to counsel and maximum penalties.  Court entered a plea of not guilty on behalf of the Defendant.
Court reserves Defendant's right to file a substitution of judge pursuant to Sec. 971.20 until Defendant's next scheduled court appearance.  Defendant IS Public Defender eligible.  Defendant is ordered to provide the public defender's office with the next court date.  The case is adjourned to Br. 37 for a Pretrial Conference.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for March 24, 2015 at 08:30 am.
SUMMONS MAILED. DEFENDANT ORDERED INTO ROOM 221 SAFETY BUILDING ON 3/17/15 @ 1:30 pm
